StringTable.String: Considering all our civilization offers, it's only natural for the lesser races to look up to us. If we make the process of emigration easier, Altarians will shine our light on the galaxy, increasing our influence greatly.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of the people who arrive in Altarian space cling to their old, inferior traditions. If we can remove the attachments they have to their old, backwards cultures, we can increase the acceptance of our own that much more.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: The Altarian standard of living is now obviously the superior choice for sentient beings in this galaxy. All sane beings dream of becoming Altarian, to join us as we march on to our destiny.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: The destiny of the Altarian people lies not in this universe, but the next. Our greatest minds are already making preparations for delivering our glorious civilization to these higher planes.

StringTable.Label: AltarianXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing Altarians to take their private enterprises into space will require careful regulation lest they begin inefficiently using resources that could be better used for the public good. But the potential a strong economy offers can't be ignored.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing private enterprise to build their own wealth is a troubling idea for many of our people, going against much of what we stand for. But the boost to our economy should indirectly benefit Altarians everywhere.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Redirecting our economic policy to support workers and generally improve the work/life balance will please Altarians throughout our civilization.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we increase the amount with which we trade with our neighbors, we'll not only profit more, but tie them that much closer to us and our destiny.

StringTable.Label: AltarianXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: We're dealing with far more complicated and involved markets than ever before. Revised regulations and economic buildings will be necessary to ensure Altarians can profit from this without sacrificing our quality of life.

StringTable.Label: AltarianInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Our private sector has grown at an alarming pace, leaving many Altarians frightened at what our civilization is becoming. A new generation of banks and regulations will be necessary to encourage this wealth to grow in a sustainable fashion.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: People throughout the galaxy appreciate Altarian goods, everything we touch seeming to be more valuable in their eyes. We should increase our trading efforts more to take advantage of everyone's envy.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatness is so obviously destined for the Altarian people that we can now begin extracting favorable terms from our treaty partners.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we do everything we can to accommodate tourists, we can encourage more of them to travel here and learn our ways. As a side-effect, they might spend a bit more money while they're here.

StringTable.Label: AltarianFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Buildings dedicated to complicated financial machinations should help generate much additional wealth for our civilization. Which is hard to turn down, even if it is a little unseemly for an Altarian.

StringTable.Label: AltarianGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Galactic stock markets will make it easier than ever for Altarians to generate wealth. Altaria was always known for its enlightened people; and know it shall be known for its wealthy ones as well.

StringTable.Label: AltarianInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Trade is an excellent way to build friendly relations with neighbors. If they didn't love Altaria for our culture, they shall love us for our goods.

StringTable.Label: AltarianGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated trading hubs will encourage our traders and their partners to do more of their business here. Where it can be more easily taxed, and thus benefit all Altarians.

StringTable.Label: AltarianGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've developed a taste for trading, the volume of goods passing through our ports has grown immensely. Enhanced facilities will be needed to ensure the money continues to flow into Altarian coffers.

StringTable.Label: AltarianTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Every lesser race in the galaxy knows that Altarian markets are the only place to move their goods, and the latest generation of trading buildings will increase our trading income more still.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEnjoymentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Enjoyment

StringTable.Label: AltarianEnjoymentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending resources on public entertainment is something all Altarians approve of and even demand. What purpose could be higher than improving an Altarian's quality of life?

StringTable.Label: AltarianInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: The rich and full lives that Altarians enjoy is the envy of the galaxy, and we've already begun luring visitors from our neighbors. Some increased tourism infrastructure can help encourage this.

StringTable.Label: AltarianMeditationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Meditation

StringTable.Label: AltarianMeditationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Meditation Centers.

StringTable.Label: AltarianMeditationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Meditation Centers will give Altarians a quiet place to reflect on their lives, the nature of the galaxy, and our rightful place in it, greatly boosting a planet's approval.

StringTable.Label: AltarianIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our industry off world turned out to be far more dangerous than we anticipated, and we slowed everything down until we were confident the work could be done safely. But now that we've analyzed things, we've spotted a number of ways we can begin specializing our industry.

StringTable.Label: AltarianConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: As the Altarian civilization expands, we will find ourselves in a near constant state of construction. We should ensure our construction practices are as efficient as possible.

StringTable.Label: AltarianManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Specializing our manufacturing processes will allow us to boost the capacity of specific sectors, or even to save money we could use to improve our people's lives in some other way

StringTable.Label: AltarianIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are now famed throughout the galaxy for their industry, and yet even at this advanced stage, they're unwilling to rest. There are still some improvements left to make.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPrecursorHistory_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor History

StringTable.Label: AltarianPrecursorHistory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let the wisdom of the Precursors improve our society.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPrecursorHistory_Dec
StringTable.String: By better understanding the history of the Precusors, we can begin taking steps to make our race even greater than it already is.

StringTable.Label: AltarianResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian researchers are of course geniuses, but in their exuberance to keep pushing back the veil of darkness, they've developed a number of inefficient practices. We should correct some of those now.

StringTable.Label: AltarianTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we specialize our research facilities, we'll be able to accelerate the pace of findings in the fields most important to securing Altaria's future.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians are intelligent and adaptable enough to make ideal colonists, and now have the free time to dedicate their energies to improving specific aspects of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: AltarianAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Various aspects of our agricultural sector appear ripe for optimization, which, if implemented, should lead to much more efficient farms.

StringTable.Label: AltarianFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It should come as no surprise that our civilization became master farmers; our peaceful and nurturing disposition is without peer in this galaxy. And yet still a few more improvements can be made to our agricultural industry.

StringTable.Label: AltarianColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people should never have to suffer, even on an extreme world. We must do everything we can to ensure the quality of life of every Altarian, no matter where they live.

StringTable.Label: AltarianBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the latest technology, even the deadliest and most toxic worlds need no longer inflict such a harsh toll on the Altarians who live there.

StringTable.Label: AltarianInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we want to continue sending ships further and further from the safety of Altaria, we should begin improving our equipment and navigational techniques immediately.

StringTable.Label: AltarianIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians never settle for good, and now that our engineers have had a chance to work with our Ion Drive systems for a bit, they've identified a number of ways to make them even better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, but that just means there's lots of room for improvement. Our finest minds have already come up with some promising leads.

StringTable.Label: AltarianHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian ships are already the best in the galaxy and yet still our engineers spend hours looking for ways to wring even more power from their engines.

StringTable.Label: AltarianSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Sensor systems are so often overlooked in favor of more glamorous technologies that it's highly likely we will be able to improve upon them with only a minimal amount of effort.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our ship's engineers have begun reporting back that there are a number of different ways we could begin improving our field detectors.

StringTable.Label: AltarianSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered sensor technology like few other races. But that's no reason to give up yet. A few more improvements should still be possible.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've observed the impact that Precusor relics have on our society, we can coax Altarians to react to them in very specific ways.

StringTable.Label: AltarianLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's an easy sell to the budgetary oversight committee when we promise we're working to optimize our life support systems. Everyone wants the best for our crews.

StringTable.Label: AltarianSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Field-based life support systems are powerful, but still a little messy. Some tweaks to their design and operation could make them far more efficient and pleasant to use.

StringTable.Label: AltarianLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We shall spare no expense in building the best possible life support systems in the galaxy. Few races care for their crews like we do. Even now, our researchers work to improve these systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: AltarianOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Building things in orbit is proving to be extremely challenging. Some more research is needed to identify areas of improvement and begin addressing them.

StringTable.Label: AltarianZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Expanding the scale of our micro gravity construction has proven to be a challenging but rewarding exercise. And recently, our construcion managers have found a few ways we can begin building even more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: AltarianOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The state of the Altarian ship-building industry has never been better, our engineers continually finding ways to improve our large scale construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: AltarianHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altaria's ships already dominate the galactic playing field, and still our engineers find ways to make them better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're going to risk Altarian pilots in fighter combat situations, we should ensure our carrier systems are as refined and efficient as possible.

StringTable.Label: AltarianLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Waste is never acceptable, but especially not in the depths of space. We should dedicate some research effort to finding new ways to improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: AltarianWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: If we're going to divert resources to weapon systems for self-defensive purposes, we'll benefit if we focus our research efforts on a specific class of weapon.

StringTable.Label: AltarianBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the hard work of our engineers in the material sciences, our next generation of beam weapons should be much more efficient.

StringTable.Label: AltarianHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: However powerful our beam weapons are becoming, there are still a number of inefficiencies in them that can be improved upon.

StringTable.Label: AltarianBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altaria has, to the dismay of the aggressive species, become masters at using beam weapons. And still, despite our edge, we will not rest in our efforts to make them a bit better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After much work at the test range, which they promise they didn't enjoy, our weapons engineers have discovered a few ways we can improve our missiles systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers promise that they haven't just been blowing stuff up for fun, and that they've in fact found a number of ways we could improve our missile warheads.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a little dismaying to see how excitable our weapons researchers are getting. To enjoy using such destructive tools seems very un-Altarian. Still, their exuberance should lead to even more improvements in our self-defensive capabilities.

StringTable.Label: AltarianKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: However vicious they are, if we're going to use them, we should at least make sure to use them properly. More research on kinetic weapons could result in any number of possible improvements.

StringTable.Label: AltarianKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our kinetic weapons are becoming incredibly dangerous, and the aggressor species of the galaxy now know we are not a race to be trifled with. We should continue improving our kinetic weapons to maintain our self-defensive capabilities.

StringTable.Label: AltarianKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarians are masters of the kinetic weapon, and few species are foolish enough to menace our ships now. Let's continue our research efforts to ensure it stays that way.

StringTable.Label: AltarianInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Even if we never intend to use them, we will be a more credible player on the galactic stage if we are capable of using advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: AltarianGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces, although we should resolve to never use these weapons unless absolutely necessary.

StringTable.Label: AltarianDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at building defensive systems left much room for improvement. For the sake of our crews, we have to do better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's to make them stronger, cheaper, or lighter, there are a number of ways we can begin improving our shield systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of our Barrier Field systems has revealed that we're dramatically underutilizing their potential. We should begin improving them immediately.

StringTable.Label: AltarianShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our dedicated efforts to master shield technology, Altarian crews are now incredibly safe. Though that's no reason to rest; our shield systems can still get better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our point defense systems are still quite primitive, with much room for improvement. For the sake of our crews, we must continue making these systems better.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ECM suites are already incredibly effective, but this is only the first step. These systems can still be improved in a number of ways.

StringTable.Label: AltarianDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems provide incredible proteciton against missile attacks. But no system is perfect, and our engineers believe we can still find cost or weight savings in these systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should spare no expense when it comes to the protection of our crews, and immediately look for ways to improve upon our existing armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Advanced computer modelling is capable of modelling armor behavior under impact, which should let our engineers see ways to improve upon the design of these systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We've done excellent work protecting our crews to date, but can't assume the violent beings that menace us will halt their own weapons research. We must continue improving our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: AltarianDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should think very carefully about how we present ourselves to our neighbors. Studying their comically backwards ways of thinking should be the first step.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should choose how we organize our government very carefully, to ensure the welfare and safety of all Altarians.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As our glorious civilization grows, a number of new methods of governmental organization have become practical. We should choose among them very carefully.

StringTable.Label: AltarianPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We are masters of civilized debate and rational thinking, and all of Altaria benefits for it. So great is our powers of self-control that the most advanced polticial footings are now available to us.

StringTable.Label: AltarianDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We should ensure that the treaties we enter in to benefit our people in the maximum possible way. They should settle for nothing less.

StringTable.Label: AltarianAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There are different types of alliance which we should become familiar with. Depending on the limitations of the species we're allying ourselves with, some of these may be more appropriate than others.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian culture is so obviously the pinnacle of what civilized beings are capable of, that we should do everything we can to ensure its spread throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It's often the case that our culture, however fine it is, doesn't penetrate as far as it should, the small minded people of the galaxy distracted by their small minded concerns. But some specific modifications may help us target these challenging audiences.

StringTable.Label: AltarianCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Targeted programs can help boost specific sectors of the Altarian economy, delivering wealth and benefit to where it's needed most.

StringTable.Label: AltarianEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A more refined understanding of the complexities of galactic markets will allow us to boost specific sectors of our economy, ensuring Altaria's strategic needs are met by its growing economy.

StringTable.Label: AltarianTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our traders are already masters of wringing profits from the simpler races of this galaxy, but with a little more effort, we can make their trade routes even more lucrative by targeting specific markets.

StringTable.Label: AltarianTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: So trusted are Altarian traders that we can now begin creating trade routes that traffic in the materials needed to aid strategic goals of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: AltarianApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are so naturally filled with approval of our leadership, that manipulating their attitude feels a little crude. But in those rare cases where approval dips, it would be prudent to have available certain techniques to get the people back on our side.
